name: Manageris
overview:
Manageris is a privately held company whose main offices are located in Paris, France. The company has been operating since 1992. Manageris Synopses, available by monthly subscription, offer managers and executives a unique way to monitor the latest in management thinking.

At the heart of our approach:

  • Systematic monitoring of leading international academic and professional articles in the field of management;

  • Manageris channels complex and nuanced management thinking in digestible and engaging ways, to bring to light the most effective management ideas, with the aim of facilitating the transition to action.

Our custom work, On-the-job Learning solutions enhance the effectiveness of management development initiatives. Tailored mainly for large companies with a global presence, these solutions provide managers and executives with intuitive ways, through handbooks, company intranets and other digital access points, to easily find high-quality “food for thought” and practical advice to better meet their daily management challenges and long-term development goals. Our online leadership toolboxes, for example, provide managers and executives with food for thought on management issues, as well as practical advice on how to best assume their role and implement strategic company initiatives. Our work strengthens and sustains the impact of leadership development initiatives - such as training programs, 360° assessments and the deployment of leadership frameworks. Our projects are therefore highly personalized to meet the needs of the program and to ensure complete coherence with the management culture unique to each company. We work in English and French.
